mapper.select: SELECT PI_NUM, GI_NUM, UI_NUM, PI_POINT, CREDAT, LMODAT FROM POINT_INFO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POINT_INFO(PI_NUM, GI_NUM, UI_NUM, PI_POINT) VALUES(#{piNum}, #{giNum}, #{uiNum}, #{piPoint})
mapper.select: SELECT PI.*, GI.GI_NAME, UI.UI_NAME FROM POINT_INFO PI LEFT JOIN GAME_INFO GI ON PI.GI_NUM = GI.GI_NUM LEFT JOIN USER_INFO UI ON PI.UI_NUM = UI.UI_NUM WHERE PI.GI_NUM=1 ORDER BY PI.PI_POINT DESC LIMIT 11;
